cons: Some processes and structures can be more productive, but it is a start-up so everyone is constantly trying to make things better.
pros: - Diverse and very open minded team mates
text: Pros - Diverse and very open minded team mates - Good communication - Interesting product - Flexible working hours - Autonomy & Responsibility for my area of work - Competitive Salary Cons Some processes and structures can be more productive, but it is a start-up so everyone is constantly trying to make things better. Advice to Management - Keep trying to diversify management.
title: I love it here
